meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Swanson Michael Bilow Jacqueline Hawkins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7035.

td.p: Eric Swanson, a Ph.D. student in experimental pathology from Charlottesville, Virginia
Michael Bilow, a Ph.D. student in computer science originally from Chicago, Illinois
Jacqueline Hawkins, an English professor from Louisville, Kentucky (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,101)

tr.td: ROUGH WORDS IN NATIONAL ANTHEMS
THE FILM-TO-TV ROLE
REMEMBER 2014?
"-EY" MAN
FONTS
OF INFORMATION

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: It helps if you\'re in the right area. If you\'re on the ground, you\'re in trouble.)
...
(Alex: [To Eric] No, he\'s on the ground, on the rails. And he\'s on the rails in more ways than one. He loses $14,599. He has $6,201...)
...
(Alex: No, think of air, think of Hebrew, [*]. And the year, very important, 1948.)
JacquelineWhat is ?
$6,200
EricWhat is Amtrak
$14,599
MichaelWhat is Greyhound
$16,199
El Al Airlines')
